articles.author: Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: Zomato surrenders payment aggregator and wallet license to RBI - Entrackr
articles.description: Foodtech major Zomato has decided to voluntarily surrender the payment aggregator and wallet license to the Reserve Bank of India (RBI).

articles.title: OpenAI Spring Update event today: ChatGPT, GPT-4 updates and more Sam Altman may announce - The Times of India
articles.description: TECH NEWS : OpenAI's Spring Update event introduces major upgrades to ChatGPT and GPT-4, teasing new features like AI voice assistant and potential phone call cap

articles.author: Ekta Mourya
articles.title: Top AI tokens bleed despite reports of Apple closing deal to use OpenAI features - FXStreet
articles.description: Technology giant Apple Inc. has reportedly reached an agreement with Artificial Intelligence (AI) firm OpenAI to include the latter’s tech in the next iPhone.
articles.content:
• Apple has closed a deal with OpenAI to use the latter’s technology in its new iPhone, Bloomberg reports.
  • The giant’s iOS 18 could come packed with ChatGPT features, per the report.
